# Children of the Revolution (1923 film)

| music          =

Children of the Revolution () is a 1923 German silent film directed by Hans Theyer and starring Carl Heinz Fischer, Oscar Beregi and Albert von Kersten.
The film's sets were designed by the art director Hans Rouc. It was shot at the Sievering Studios in Vienna.
Cast
* Carl Heinz Fischer
* Oscar Beregi
* Albert von Kersten
* Artur Ranzenhofer
* Annemarie Schartmüller
* Grete Wegscheid
* Renati Renee
* Franz Herterich
